name: Uta
text: [On Play] DON!! -2 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck): Your Leader and all your Characters gain +1000 Power until the start of your next turn.

effect.text: Your Leader and all your Characters gain +1000 Power until the start of your next turn.

powerMod.duration: until the start of your next turn
